Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/libtasn1/libtasn1-4.19.0.tar.gz
ğŸš echo 1613f0ac1cf484d6ec0ce3b8c06d56263cc7242f1c23b30d82d23de345a63f7a  libtasn1-4.19.0.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf libtasn1-4.19.0.tar.gz
ğŸš cd libtasn1-4.19.0
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/libtasn1-4.19.0 --disable-static
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
